#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

int main()
{
	ll i,t,j,k,n,pro;
	vector <ll> p;

	cin>>t;

	while(t--) {
		cin>>n;
		
		k = n;
		if(k%2==0) {
			p.push_back(2);
			while(k%2==0) k = k/2;
		}

		for(j=3;j<=k;j+=2) {
			if(k%j==0) {
				p.push_back(j);
				while(k%j==0) k = k/j;
			}
		}

		pro = n;

		k = p.size();

		for(j=0;j<k;j++) {
			pro = (pro * (p[j]-1))/p[j];
		}
		cout<<pro<<endl;
		p.clear();
	}

	return 0;
}
